79a1: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor nam mkha'
79a2: med pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pa 'o byin pa 'dini nyam pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad dmigs su med par mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir
79a3: ro/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dben pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis
79a4: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rdzob ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
79a5: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gzhi ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ming med pa dang / lus med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan pa/
79a6: 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha' lta bu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
79a7: 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di brjod du ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
79a8: 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
79b1: gyis gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la ste/ shes bkyi pha rol du phyin pa pa sa du phyin pa 'di ni 'thob ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'thob med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsam/
79b2: babacom ldan 'das 'di sa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi thogs pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byod kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan/
79b3: 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad shin du byang zhing zad pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
79b4: pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes pa
79b5: kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni byed po ma mchis pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol tu
79b6: byin pa 'di ni shes pa po ma mchis pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ shes pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa par 'du phyin pa 'dini
79b7: 'breb ma mchis pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chi ba dang skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ste ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'jigs
79b8: ma bachis pa lags so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni drimapa
80a1: thulagasags pa ldananas sa gsal pa/ la ga nas pa d+ma dgasas pa gyu // sa gas ga/ sa spyan nas su// ngas du gyun pa ngas byu da/
80a2: chal bu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgra'i brjod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mig yongal bya
80a3: lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs brnyan dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni smig rngus bu lags
80a4: so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu lags so// bcom
80a5: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa lags so// bcom
80a6: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis
80a7: ba lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par
80a8: byang ba ma mchis pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yod par mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol gyi pa
80b1: 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pa rom du rgyan
80b2: pa 'dri ni dmigs su ma mchis pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa
80b3: 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du
80b4: byin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du
80b5: phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni g.yo ba ma mchis pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
80b6: pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma nor ba de bzhin nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa'i phyir ro/ rab 'byor gyis gsol/ bcom ldan
80b7: 'das 'di sa sa/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni kun nas ldang ba ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ rab 'byer gyis gsom
80b8: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med cing dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro rab 'byobar gyis gsol pa
81a1: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro dang
81a2: 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni zhe sdang ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang yod pa ma mchis pa yin pa'i phyir ro//
81a3: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po sum bcu pa/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
81a4: sdug pa gti mug gi mun pa rnam par sel ba nyid kyi phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags so// com ldan 'das
81a5: kyis bka' stsal pa/ yongs su rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
81a6: sems can dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ chos thams cad
81a7: kun nas ldang ba med pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyi su ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' dmigs su med
81a8: ba nyid kyi phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ma 'dres pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma 'dres pa med pa'i
81b1: mya'i gor ba 'thod kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dis ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pa rol du phyin pa 'di ni ni gnonas mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan das kyis pag sum pa/ can tho da nga sangs rgyas kyis lapa yang
81b2: dag par das pa cher go/ khyor gyis gsol pa/ com ldan 'das 'diH/ shes ra 'i pa rol rgyan pa pa na 'di ni rnam par martog pa lags so// bcom na sa kyis paga'ajal gnas par rtog pa migs
81b3: med pa'i phyir ro/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'din tshad ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi tshad dmigs pa kyi'o//
81b4: rab byong gis gsol ga/ bcom ldan 'das 'di / shes kyi rol du mnipa pa rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam ma 'ang tu thalags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka rgyam pa/ chos thams cad namama' bla chags pa med pa'i phyi /
81b5: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ kyi ngo byin pa ldan 'din mi rtag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
81b6: 'das 'di lta ste/ gas kyi da byinas 'o byin ga bsngal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad lhag par chags par bya ba'i 'os ma yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di/
81b7: ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsolapa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste// zhes
81b8: bci byed pa la du phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
82a1: pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lagaso/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ro/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin papa/
82a2: rol du phyin pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang gi chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
82a3: ni phyi stong pa nyid lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi'o chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi nang
82a4: stong pa nyid lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi dang nang gi chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong/
82a5: pa nyid stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa
82a6: 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
82a7: ni na dam pa stong pa nyid lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa
82a8: di/ 'dus byam stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rang 'byer gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ste ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rol tu phyin
82b1: bzhin sa sa byas stor shi pa s+ho/ / bcos ldan das kyis pag 'astsa pa/ lams bya tho nyid gas myed 'i byud ro// da stong kyi gam pa com ldan das ste/ shes pakyi'i yo tshun pa sa myen na /
82b2: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i byang ngo // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa di
82b3: nitsig ma da ma ma med pa stong pa nyid lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thog ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rabang byong kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dig ste/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa pa
82b4: chom kyi phyin pa 'di ni dang ba med pa stong pa nyid lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di sa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa
82b5: rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'du byas dang / 'dus mabyas kyi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab khyor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dis ste/ shes rabakyi rol
82b6: byin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'din chos thams cad stong pa nyid lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' rgyal pa/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
82b7: mi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ring gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di sde ste/
82b8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// ba 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ste ste/
83a1: shes rab kyi pha ros tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'don dngos po med pa stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom /
83a2: ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bo nyid stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
83a3: swA ste/ shes rab gyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis
83a4: gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu byin pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
83a5: b+his gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i spong ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dog pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor/
83a6: gyikyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ste ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'don rngu 'phrul gyi gang pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ga ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi na dpa bzhi migs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor kyis gso
83a7: pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dbang po lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbang po lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
83a8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol
83b1: tubyin pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag/ bdun dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin
83b2: ba 'di ni lam lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'din stong pa nyid lags so//
83b3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lta bar gyur pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das
83b4: kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smon pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
83b5: pa/ smon lam dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad
83b6: dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i
83b7: snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i den pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdug bsngal ba dang
83b8: kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
84a1: ser sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
84a2: 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bzod pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnod
84a3: sems dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ le lo dmigs su
84a4: med pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gtan lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ g.yeng ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// /
84a5: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes rab lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chal pa'i shes rab dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
84a6: gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs bcu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab
84a7: 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zhum pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
84a8: gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thams cad du ye shes chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa'i
84b1: phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snying rje chen po lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis
84b2: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las yang dag
84b3: par 'das pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brjod pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid
84b4: yin pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang byung lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis
84b5: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshes thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir ro//
84b6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ dmigs su med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi na lam
84b7: du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grag pa de dag kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin la/ gang dag gi rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grag par 'gyur ba de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed cing
84b8: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yong su zin pa yin no/ / gang dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs la blags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa dag lta smos kyang ci
85a1: dgos/ / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs la blags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang / de bzhin
85a2: nyid du sgrub par byed pa de dag gis ni sangs rgyas mang po dgal bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang mi skrag mi dang zhing / dang par mi 'gyur ba de dag gis
85a3: nisngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yang yongs su zhu ba byas pa yin no/ / gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang mi skrag mi dang zhing dang par mi 'gyur ba de dag
85a4: gis ni bskal pa bye ba phrag mang po dag nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad cing / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
85a5: ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dang ngo par mi 'gyur la/ 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub
85a6: par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la brtson par bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji lta ba de ltar bzung bar bgyi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
85a7: 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab lags te/ sngon pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la ma spyad pa dag gis ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par dri ma thog pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu
85a8: 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spong bar sems pa'i rigs kyi bu'amo rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni/ sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
85b1: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la dad pa ma mchis pa dang / dga' ba ma mchis pa dang / dang ba ma mchis pas/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu me dag gis sangs rgyas rnams
85b2: dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams la 'di skad du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid la
85b3: niji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ phyi stong pa nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la ni ji ltar
85b4: bsgom par bgyi/ yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ mi 'jigs
85b5: pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ zhes yongs su zhu ba ma bgyis pa'i slad du'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces
85b6: smras so/ / banan pa shA ri'i brid ltar ngom tshang yang ci che ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu zab pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sngod kyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rab tu phyin pa zab mo 'dil mos par mgyur bad
85b7: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / rtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol sa phyin pa la mos par mgyur ba dang / nang stong pa nyid la mos par mgyur pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kying
85b8: lo mos par ma gyur pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la mos par ma gyur pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
86a1: pa bcwa brgyad la mos par ma gyur pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spong bar byed pa ni ngo mtshar mi che'o/ / btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye
86a2: shes la phyag 'tshal ba yin pas na/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kau shi ka de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ gang shes rab
86a3: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las
86a4: nges par byung la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis rab tu bskyed pa yin pa'i phyir te/ kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol
86a5: tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/ / de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed par 'dod pa dang / bag chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad yang dag par 'jom par 'dod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
86a6: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o// de bzhin du sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la
86a7: dgod par 'dod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang / rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang / sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod
86a8: par 'dod pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun yongs su bsdu bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin
86b1: gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang /
86b2: tshul khrings dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyad na/ nang stong pa nyid lanal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar dngas pa med pa'i nga bo nyid stong pa nyid kyir
86b3: lanal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spya na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos bum bcurtsa bdun la rnal 'byor drab rjid pa lags/ de bzhin byang chub sems dpas
86b4: sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sa so yad dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la rnal
86b5: 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kau shi ka gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni legs so legs so// kau shi ka khyod
86b6: kyi spobs pa skyes pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin te/ kau shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
86b7: la spyod pa/ gzugs la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes
86b8: pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no// de bzhin du mig la mi gnas/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mi gnas te/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// de bzhin du gzugs la mi
87a1: gnas/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la mi gnas te/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// de bzhin du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// /
87a2: de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal
87a3: 'byor du byed do/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// de bzhin du yang dag
87a4: pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnam sa dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// tshad med pa bzhi la mi gnas par/ shes
87a5: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ / bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la mi gnas/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs
87a6: rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang la gnas pa dang / gang la rnal 'byor du byed pa'i gzugs de dmigs su med pa dang / de bzhin du gang la gnas pa
87a7: dang / gang la rnal 'byor du byed pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
87a8: sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems
87b1: dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la sbyor bar mi byed de/ gang gi phyir gzugs la sbyor bar mi byed pa de ltar gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sbyor bar mi byed de/ gang gi phyir rnam
87b2: par shes pa la sbyor bar mi byed pa de ltar rnam por shes pa la rgol 'byor du byed do/ / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang /
87b3: sto pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la sbyor bar mi byed de/ gang gi byar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la sbyor bar mi byed pa
87b4: de ltar/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la rnal 'byor du byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des gzugs sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ gzugs phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ gzugs de ltar byung bar
87b5: mi dmigs shing / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa da ltar byung bar mi dmigs la/ de bzhin du khams rnams dang
87b6: skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /
87b7: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ da ltar byung bar mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bris 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
87b8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa yin no// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang/ 'dra
88a1: byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i byar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa yin no// sha ri'i bu de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'breb par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / snong
88a2: pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa yin no// shA ri'i
88a3: bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gting dpag dka' ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bri gzugs gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba yin no// shA ri'i hri
88a4: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba yin no// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung
88a5: ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gting dpag dka' ba'i
88a6: phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir/
88a7: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin no// shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin no// sha ri'i bu de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams
88a8: dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
88b1: rnams tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
88b2: kA ri'i bri byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gal te gzugs zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dra byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar mi spyodan
88b3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang
88b4: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin la
88b5: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing / de bzhin du khams rnams dang skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /
88b6: stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
88b7: rnams ma yin no/ / zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gal te gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes
88b8: bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin
89a1: du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang
89a2: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi gting dpag dka'
89a3: ba nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gtong dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing
89a4: 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
89a5: rnams kyi gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no zhes bya bar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi gting dpag
89a6: dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ / shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te/ gzugs tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
89a7: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa tshad med de zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu
89a8: 'di ltar gzugs kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin la/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa nyid gang yin pa don rnam par shes pa ma yin zhid de bzhin du khams rnams
89b1: dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig
89b2: pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi tshad med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu
89b3: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi tshad med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ / shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de tsam du zab pa dang / de tsam du gting dpag
89b4: dka' ba dang / de tsam du rtogs par dka' ba dang / de tsam du tshad ma mchis pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mdun du bshad par mi bgyi
89b5: ste/ de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos na/ skrag cing dadad la/ dadad par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du bshad par bgyi ste/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
89b6: zab mo 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dad pa la dad par mi 'gyur zhing / nem nur bgyid par mi 'gyur/ the tshom 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba'i steng du thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur lags so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces
89b7: smras so/ / btsun pa shA ri'i buM theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du gal te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad na/ nyes pa cir 'gyur/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ kau shi ka theg pa lags
89b8: du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du gal te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad par gyur na/ skrag cing dang nga la/ dngang bar 'gyur zhing / phyir ldog pa dang / phyir spong bar 'gyur te/ mos par mi 'gyur
90a1: la/ kau shi ka gang gi phyir theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ phyir spong shing log par ltung bar 'go ba la gas par 'gyur te/ yun ring pos kyang bla na med pa
90a2: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ba'i gnas de yod do/ / brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
90a3: mo 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dang zhing / dang nga bar mi 'gyur ba lta yod dam// shA ri'i bris smras pa/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dang zhing / dngang bar
90a4: mi 'gyur ba de dag ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam/ gnyis las mi 'da' ba'i bar gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
90a5: byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ba yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bri la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sha re bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gad dag gis shes rab kyis
90a6: ngo byin pa zab pa 'ad thos na/ mi sgeg mi dang shing / dang par mi 'gyur ba'i snang du kyis nas kyi 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang / kun nub par byed ci/ ji sa bston pa bzhin du/ shes rabagyi ba sa phyin pa la gnas
90a7: ga ga sa/ y-i ga dang / // sti sa /
90a8: ga gi sa lag sa// dab gshegs shi kyis lags so// maldan das kyis pa gyul pa// byang myos pa gyis shig// sa sam ldan
90b1: 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo zhig gi g.yar lam du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
90b2: pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la mchis pa'i bar dag rmis par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na
90b3: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa lags par rig par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag sad pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
90b4: byin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing / mngon par rdzogs par
90b5: sangs rgyas nas kyang / byang chub kyi snying po la mchis shing / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar sems pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom
90b6: ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mnyan pa'i slad du rnyed cing thos nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par bgyid pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das
90b7: rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs
90b8: padang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag
91a1: gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed par 'gyur shing / rnyed par gyur nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'char ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi chu
91a2: mede dag ni zin med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i phying chub lung bstan bye ba'am/ lung bstan par 'gyur ba'am/ blani ma dpa pang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub pas phyir mi ldog par 'gyur lags// bcom ldan 'das 'di sas dper ba gyi/
91a3: zhig 'brog dgon pa dpag tsha brgya zhig nas byung bar gyur tam/ 'brog dgron pa dpag tshad nyi brgya zhig nas sam/ dpag tshad sum brgya bzhig nas sam/ dpag tshad bzhi brgya bzhig nas sam/ dpag chad lnga brgya bzhiganas byung bar
91a4: gyur nas/ de byung ba'i tshe grong khyer gyi snga ltas pa yang rdzi dag gam/ phyugs rdzi dag gas/ sa mtshams sam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ tshal dag gam/ bskyed mos tshal dag mthong bar gyur tam/ grong khyer gyi snga ltas grong dag gam/ grong rdal
91a5: dag gam/ ljongs dag gam/ yul 'khor dag gam/ mtshan ma gzhan gang yang rung ba dag mthong bar gyur na/ de 'di snyam du snga ltas 'di lta bu 'di dag gda' ba las na/ 'di nas grong dang / grong rdal dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor
91a6: dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang nye bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ dbugs phyin par 'gyur zhing / de la slad cad chom rkun gyis 'jigs pa 'am/ gdug pas 'jigs pa 'am/ gdol pas 'jigs pa 'am/ gcan zan khro bos 'jigs pa 'am/
91a7: bkres pa dang / skom pas 'jigs pa dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rnyed par 'gyur zhing / rnyed par gyur nas kyang 'dzin par
91a8: bgyid/ 'chang bar bgyid/ klog par bgyid/ kun chub par bgyid/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ lung bstan du nye ba dang / bla na med pa yang dang / par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang ring po mi
91b1: na ga/ rgyas dag k+shi/ nga na dpa ma rnanas kyisapas/ ras sa rnas kyims ga pa gas/ na/
91b2: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des 'di sa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pazab mo 'di la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba rnyed cing mnyan du rnyed de/ snga ltas de dag mchis pa'i slad du'o// de skad ces
91b3: gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthus khyod shin tu spobs par gyis shig/ shA ri'i bus
91b4: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ mi zhig brgya mtsho chen po lta 'tshal bar gyur nas/ de rgya mtsho chen po lta ba'i slad du mchis na/ ji lta ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po blta ba'i sla du mchis pa/ de lta de ltar
91b5: des yal ga 'gel ba 'am/ yal ga 'gel ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ ri'am ri'i mtshan ma dag mthong bar gyur na/ des 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di nas thag ring ste/ rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di nas thag nye ba ma lags so/
91b6: snyam du rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po dang nye ba na yal ga 'gel ba 'am/ yal ga 'gel ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ ri 'am/ ri'i mtshan ma dag ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
91b7: lha ste dper bgyi na/ mi zhig rgya mtsho chen po lta 'tshal bar gyur nas/ ji lta ji ltar mchis pa de lte de ltar des/ yal ga 'gel ba 'am/ yal ga 'gel ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ ri 'am ri'i mtshan ma dag ma mthong bar
91b8: gyur na/ de 'di snyam du rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di nas thag mi ring ngo snyam du sems par 'gyur lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po dang nye ba na yal ga 'gel ba 'am/ yal ga 'gel ba'i mtshan ma 'am/
92a1: ri'am/ ri'i mtshan ma dag mi gda' ba'i slad du'o// mi de'i mig gis rgya mtsho chen po ma mthong du lags kyang / des bdag ni rgya mtsho chen po dang nye bar gyur te/ rgya mtsho chen po ni
92a2: 'di nas thag nye'o/ / rgya mche chen po ni 'di nas thag mi ring nge zhes bgyi bar nges par rtogs lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan
92a3: pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa des kyang 'di ltar rig par bgyi zhing / 'di ltar bsam par bgyi ste/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa 'di snyed cig gam/ bskal
92a4: pa brgya phrag 'di snyed cig gam/ bskal pa stong phrag 'di snyed cig gam/ bskal pa 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig gam/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig na/ bla na med pa yang dag par
92a5: rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes mngon sum du lung ma bstan kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan
92a6: ru nye ba lags so/ snyam du rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta zhing mnyan du rnyed la/ thos nas kyang gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par
92a7: bgyi ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyir mchis so snyam du sems pa'i slad du'o// com ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyin/ dpyid blang ste/ yal ga 'gel ba rnams kyi lom dang / 'dab ma lhags par gyur pa na
92a8: 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis 'di ltar de ni ring po mi thogs par lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dag 'byung bar 'gyuraro snyam du rig par bgyi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar yal ga 'gel ba rnams la
92b1: snga ltas de dag gda' ba'i slad du ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis/ yal ga 'gel ba rnams la/ snga ltas de dag mthong nas/ 'di snyam du de ni ring bo mi thogs par lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dag
92b2: 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ yid dga' bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / mnyan pa'i
92b3: slad du rnyed cing / thos nas kyang 'dzin par bgyid/ 'chang bar bgyid/ klog par bgyid/ kun chub par bgyid/ tshul ba zhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni
92b4: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa lags par rig par bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid pa lags par rig par bgyi'o//
92b5: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang 'di snyam du/ gang gi slad du bdag cag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rnyed cing / bltar mchis pa dang / mnyan du mchis pa dang /
92b6: phyag bgyir mchis pa dang / ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgrub tu mchis pa las na/ bdag cag ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsnyen pa
92b7: lags so/ / snyam du rig par bgyi lags so// de ni gang dag sngon sangs rgyas mthong bar gyur pa'i lha'i bu dag 'di snyam du/ sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la yang lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i
92b8: snga ltas 'di lta bu de dag byung bar gyur pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag kyang ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro snyam nas yid rangs shing rab tu
93a1: dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skye lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyin/ bud med sbrum pa ni dzi lta ji ltar bu btsa' bar nye ba de lta de ltar de'i lus 'gyur te/ lus ngas ba'i tshe ba chen
93a2: be skye ba dang / 'chag par mi bgyid pa dang / dran pa chung ba dang / g.yar zas kyi deng chung ba dang / mugs pa dang / gnyid chung ba dang tsher ba de lta bu dag byung bas skra ba nyung ba dang / des sngon tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyis shing
93a3: bsten pa dang / lan mang du bgyis shing kun tu bsten pas 'di lta bu'i tshor ba 'di dag nyams su myong ngo snyam ru rtogs nas/ mi bsten pa'i ngang tshul can du 'gyur zhing / bud med gzhan dag gis kyang / bud med de'i mtshan ma gang
93a4: lags pa de dag mthong nas/ 'di snyam du bud med 'di ni ring po mi thogs par bu btsa' bar 'gyur re zhes rtogs par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/
93a5: sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa spyod pa legs pa spyad pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu zin pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa za mo 'di rnyed cing / rnyed nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'char
93a6: dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la 'gyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang ring po ma thogs par/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur bar
93a7: rig par rab gyi lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod spobs pa skyes pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin te/ shA ri'i bri leg so legs so//
93a8: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa bam po sum bcu rtsa gcig pa// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin
93b1: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la pan btags pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems
93b2: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bosang pol badre ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba / spya du nas kyi lci khobal pa ni'i don dade/ pan dang / bde ba'i phyir/ blan med nga dgapa
93b3: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da/ spyad pa spyod pa na/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don mthun pa dang / don spyad bdag gis byang chub sems
93b4: dpa' stong phrag mang po dag la pan 'dogs shing / sems can rnams kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi rnams yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
93b5: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing / bdag kyang chos de dag la gnas par byed do// bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go
93b6: bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / gzhan dag kyang
93b7: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten cing / thabs la mkhas pas/ sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god par byed kyang / bdag nyid kyis
93b8: mngon sum duni mi byed do/ / de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ang ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub po 'god par byed kyang bdag nyid kyang nga byang chu mngon sum du mi byed do//
94a1: bdag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la 'god par byed do// de bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' gzhan
94a2: dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go// bdag kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba yang dag par
94a3: 'dzin du 'jug go/ / bdag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams skyed par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams thob par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go// bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag par byed cing
94a4: gzhan dag kyang gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag par bya ba la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ / bdag kyang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du
94a5: 'jug go/ / bdag kyang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go// bdag kyang mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su
94a6: 'dzin par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang mtshan phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go// ba dag kyang gzhon nur gyur pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang gzhon nur gyur pa
94a7: dran sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ / bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgrub par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgrub par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug
94a8: go/ bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi skyed par byed cing/ gzhan dag kyang bsam gtan bzhi skyed par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go// bdag kyang tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
94b1: pabazhi dang / mi 'jigs pa pashi / mam yang dag par ga pa pa'i skyed par byed cing/ gzhan dag kyang mas yang dag par dag pa bzhi tho ba par bya ba yang dag par 'dzi drug/ bdag kyangasangs rgyas kyi chos pa
94b2: pa bcwa brgyang bsgrub par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go// bdag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang rnam pa thams
94b3: cad mkhyen pa nyid yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ / bdag kyang bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar byed cing / gzhan dag kyang bag chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs
94b4: pa thams cad spong bar bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ / bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed cing / gzhan dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
94b5: rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya bar yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ / bdag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed cing / gzhan dag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/
94b6: rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ blan med pa yang dag pa
94b7: rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing yon tan mang po dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ / bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems
94b8: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
95a1: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ gzugs kyi rnam par 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i
95a2: rnam par 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no// de bzhin du khams rnams dang
95a3: skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / sos
95a4: yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yongs su 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab
95a5: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no/ / rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ gzugs kyi yongs su 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / tshor ba dang /
95a6: 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i yongs su 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no// de bzhin du khams
95a7: rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
95a8: dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yongs su 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs
95b1: pa yin no/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na// chos shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // chos ma yin zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // 'das pa zhes bya bar
95b2: yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / dge ba dang mi dge ba dang / lung bstan du yod pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'du byas dang /
95b3: 'dus ma byas shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'dod pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gzugs kyi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gzugs med pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang
95b4: dag par rjes su mi mthong / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par
95b5: rjes su mi mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos rnams kyi chos
95b6: kyi mtshan nyid ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / snying po med pa nyid dang / ya maR+Ya nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis
95b7: mi khyab pa bstan pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa yin no// rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
95b8: rnams dang rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa yin no// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa yin no// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang /
96a1: brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa yin no// de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong
96a2: pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/
96a3: bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa yin no// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar kun tu shes par mi byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bsam
96a4: gyis mi khyab ces bya bar kun tu shes par mi byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no// gal te khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
96a5: kyi chos rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar kun tu shes par mi byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
96a6: phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tutu phyin pa zab mo 'di la su dag mos par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang dag sngon pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spong spyod pa dang
96a7: de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa bskyed skyed pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ro// rab
96a8: 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sprad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrun pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis
96b1: yongs su zin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// gzugs kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin
96b2: du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye
96b3: mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med
96b4: pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
96b5: pa rnam su/ / mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// de ci'i phyir zhe
96b6: narab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs ni bsam gyis mi khyab/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab la/ de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /
96b7: stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/
96b8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
97a1: com ldan da pag zugs za pa'i skad shes pa kyi ro la phyin panapa pa lags so// tshe rab su 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pazab pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi ba rol tu zin pa zab pa lags so/ zhi 'ams rnamasas
97a2: rnamapa dang / rken cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / parol byen pa rnams dang / stong sha thams dang / nga chub kyi bregs kyi sa rnam pa dang / sto sa bcu dang / mi 'dzags pa ban dang / seMs yang dag par ga pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos 'as paza pa'i blang
97a3: du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa lags so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab pa'i slad du/ she ba rab kyi pha rol tu zin pa zab pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig byar 'ong ba 'bras
97a4: bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / ra byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rin po che dge skyed par bgyid pas/ rin po che'i zung po lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ri chis kyi 'khor lo
97a5: bskor bar bgyi pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad kyi dge ba'i phung po lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs dag pa nyid de / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
97a6: pa dag pa nyid dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / rnam
97a7: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa na/ bar char dmang po mi 'byung ba ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin
97a8: no/ di bzhi da/ shes rabagyi pha rol tu byin pa zab mo 'di la ni bar cha med ste/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gar 'dri ba dang / ston pa dang / klog pa dang / 'chang ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom par byed pa da/
97b1: gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / bstan pa dang / bshad pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar dag la bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar myur ba nyid du yi ger bri bar bya zhing / myur ba nyid du bsgom par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhed na/
97b2: rab 'byor rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di zla ba gcig gis yi ger bri bar bya na yang des de bzhin du yi ger bri bar bya/ gal te zla ba gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ drag gam/ bdun nam/ lo bar gyis
97b3: yi ge ri bri bar bya na yang des de bzhin du yi ger bri bar bya/ gal te lo'i bar gyis bshad pa dang / kha ton du bya ba dang / rab tu bstan par bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / bsgom par bya na yang des de bzhin du bsgom par bya ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
97b4: rab 'byor rin po che chen po 'di la ni bar chad mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdun sdig can 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger mi bri ba dang / mi klog pa dang / kha ton du mi bgyid pa dang /
97b5: tshul bzhin du yid la mi bgyi ba dang / bsgom par mi bgyi ba'i slad du bar chad bgyi par mi 'gyur lags sam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bdud sdig can ni 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di cinam kyang yi ger mi bri ba dang / mi klag pa dang /
97b6: khe ton du mi bgyid pa dang / mi bsnor bar bya ba'i bar gyi phyir/ bar chad bya bar btson mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /
97b7: bsgom pa rnams la bar chad byed mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das su'i mthus na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang /
97b8: sgom pa'i bar dag la bdud sdig can gyis par chad bgyid par rngo ma thog pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shanga'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthum na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes bkyi rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi gang 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang / 'arab
98a1: 6/ dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dag sgom pa bdag la bdud sdig can par chad byed mi nas so// sha ri'i bu gang yang phyogs bcu kun na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mthung / sangs
98a2: rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por de la dgongs shing pan 'dogs par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis dgongs shing ban btags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi gar 'dri ba
98a3: dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgoms pa rnams la bdad sdig can bar chad byed mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha rI bre 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
98a4: tu phyin pa zab po 'di yi ger 'dra ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / 'chad pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa rnams la bdud sdig can bar chad byed mi nus pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bi phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams
98a5: tshad med grangs med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa gang dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sha' ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri
98a6: bdang / klog pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / 'chad pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa de yi dgongs par 'gyur ba ni chos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// sha ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang / 'aton
98a7: du byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa des kyang 'di ltar bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger 'dri'o// klog go// kha ton du byed do// ston to// tshul bzhin du yid la byed do// sgom mo snyam du rig par bya'o// sha ri'i bus
98a8: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rig kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du bgyid pa dang / ston pa dang / skam pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags sam/
98b1: kun kyang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gzung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// ji skad sbas pa de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lur nod pa dang /
98b2: kha ton du byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang ston par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom par byed pa de dag thams cad ni/ shi ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin pa dang / kun kyang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba yin par rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bus gsol pa
98b3: bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton du bgyid pa dang / 'chang ba dang / ston pa dang / sgom pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni/ phyogs bcu kun
98b4: gyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag gis mkhyen lags so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes
98b5: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton du bgyid pa dang / 'chang ba dang / ston pa dang / sgom pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs shi // thugs su
98b6: chud lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / ston pa dang /
98b7: sgom pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa de dag ni phyogs bcu kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis mkhyen to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
98b8: 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs shing thugs su chud de/ shA ri'i bu theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar 'gyur ba yin no// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi
99a1: 'a ga/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa mang bar 'gyur zhing / me tog dang / gdug pa dang spos dang / me tog phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phyem
99a2: dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ mchod par byed par 'gyur te/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / rigs
